channel.title: CVE Feed for fastify -- fastify-reply-from
channel.description: The latest CVEs for fastify -- fastify-reply-from

item.title: CVE-2021-21321|2024-08-03T18:09:15.260Z -- fastify -- fastify-reply-from
item.description: fastify-reply-from is an npm package which is a fastify plugin to forward the current http request to another server. In fastify-reply-from before version 4.0.2, by crafting a specific URL, it is possible to escape the prefix of the proxied backend service. If the base url of the proxied server is "/pub/", a user expect that accessing "/priv" on the target service would not be possible. In affected versions, it is possible. This is fixed in version 4.0.2.
